text:
Message 1962 of 4024
We agreed that we would follow the RO and Parenting plan. I quoted you so there was no confusion. That is what we are doing. My entire concern
was we could not. That’s why I asked for a call. You assured me we would. I expect us to do that.
You are right!! Let’s not do calls till we get the new one in place. Just fyi- the reason I could not find the right one today is because yesterday Annalisa
sent the wrong one again to Lisa and me yesterday.
Sent:03/07/2024 at 08:00 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 03/07/2024 at 10:16 PM)
Subject:Re: Andy
Message 1963 of 4024
Hey!
Good morning! I think we have a few topics. Glad it does not have to be separate emails!
• AD and Dad: I chatted with him earlier this AM. He is playing the new fortnight now so we agreed I would grab him around lunch.
• SAAS: We are good to go. I'll keep you in the loop with any updates I get. I have talked to AD. We will get his charger back on Monday.
• RO: Annalisa keeps sending the version that has "physical violence." Should we update and send it to her instead to stop the confusion?
• Parenting Plan: If I can get this to you and Annalisa today, can you guys formally approve it today so we can knock that out?
• Sonos: I think they should all be down and ready for handoff now. What is going to work best for you so I can keep that moving?
• Andy: As mentioned, I'm all in as you confirmed we would follow the Plan and RO. If you let him know that, we can start today.
Yikes! Six important topics in one exchange. I am extra appreciative of your cooperation and flexibility this week as this is still so hard. But we have are
making progress. Teamwork !
--------------------------- Andy Rules Exercise---------------------------
Just for fun I did the calc on our Andy discussion. It was far simpler than SAAS, but it might be a decent barometer for what his email rules look like
if with a recent, real-world example.
We had
• 3 email exchanges
• 18 OFW exchanges
His Cost
• $ 5 - send one topic email
• $20 - per mandatory reply
Response Rules
• 24 hours for the questions
Sent:03/08/2024 at 09:08 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 03/08/2024 at 09:09 AM)
Subject:Abv. Running List: Friday 3/8
